summary: A modern-day witch likes her neighbor but despises his fiancée, so she enchants him to love her instead.
cast: James Stewart|Kim Novak|Jack Lemmon|Ernie Kovacs|Hermione Gingold|Elsa Lanchester|Janice Rule|Philippe Clay|Bek Nelson|Howard McNear|The Brothers Candoli|Fred Aldrich|Leon Alton|Monty Ash|Joe Barry|Wolfe Barzell|Willie Bloom|Gail Bonney|Don Brodie|Conte Candoli|Pete Candoli|Dick Crockett|Jack Deery|Robert Haines|Jimmie Horan|James Lanphier|Perk Lazelle|Guy Lux|Ted Mapes|Maurice Marks|Hans Moebus|Ollie O'Toole|Joe Palma|Pyewacket|June Smaney|John Truax
title: Me enamoré de una bruja
